title: Plant Physiology is recruiting Assistant Features Editors to start in 2025 and 2026
content: We started the Plant Physiology Assistant Features Editor program more than 6 years ago to help young scientists to advance their career and help disseminate exciting discoveries published in Plant Physiology. Since then, more than 100 early-career scientists, mostly postdocs but also some advanced graduate students, have served as Assistant Features Editors (AFEs).
